title: Normals acting funny
body: I am a fresh 30 and this sort of thing has happened in all of my normal games. Im with people that are plat and above in ranked. I have no idea why this is happening but its not fun losing every normal game to people that are better than me and have all champs. I don't even have the # of champs to play ranked yet so I cant play ranked as an alternative.

replies.body: Normal games are separate from ranked games, and since you just hit 30 matchmaking is trying to figure out your spot in League.  As you continue to play, your MMR will continue to adjust as well until it puts you in a spot best fit for you.  Keep at it, and you should see a more even match up.
